comments.body: Is the archive name really the right thing to use for the bundle id?  Seems like we should have an extra parameter here for the id.  Or maybe it doesn't matter?  Can we use null for the id?  Is the id even needed in the super class?

At the moment, using the far archive name will likely confuse log parsing and isolate discovery, but this PR is already getting big, so I added a TODO to extract the app name from the archive as on other platforms.
